markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Beastbrood](/Feats.aspx?ID=2449) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Lineage" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=317" />
<trait label="Tiefling" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=258" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 61 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

One of your ancestors was a [rakshasa](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=85), the corrupt and aristocratic reincarnated souls that call Golarion home. You have some dim echo of your ancestor's memories— enough to play the role of noble as needed, no matter your origins. You're trained in [Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14). If you're already trained in Society (from your background or class, for example), you instead become trained in a skill of your choice. You also gain the [Courtly Graces](/Feats.aspx?ID=772) skill feat.

<title level="2">Beastbrood leads to...</title>
[Idol Threat](/Feats.aspx?ID=3942), [Jalmeri Rakshasa Magic](/Feats.aspx?ID=3941), [Rakshasa Magic](/Feats.aspx?ID=2455), [Reveal Hidden Self](/Feats.aspx?ID=3938)
name: Beastbrood
